"Koffie": "<%me>. Good work. I am Officer Koffie."
"Keeping your actions in mind, we've unlocked the \"Super Hard\" Quest Rank."
"There's no need for a Difficulty System unlocking exam. It has been decided that someone with your abilities will have no issue."
"But regardless, the hostiles that appear will be far stronger than any you've ever faced. Be on your guard."
"There are many ARKS members. But there's only one like you. So please don't overdo things. ...Now then, if you'll excuse me. "

"ARKS Missions promotion!
The Daily and Weekly missions you are assigned will now increase in difficulty and rewards!"
